A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is better than The Rise of Skywalker despite its own major flaws. The main issues are the weird comedy\, the disregard for the characters (in particular Luke) and Star Wars lore (e.g. the Holdo Maneuver)\, and the pointless side quest with Finn and Rose that contains some preachy animal cruelty content. However\, at least this film wasn't a clone of one of the original films so it has that going for it but it was still somewhat painful to watch.
